objects.text:
• Adjustable Height & Comfort
• Premium PU Leather
• Ergonomic Design
• 275 lbs Weight Capacity

product_details.description: Product Description          Amazon Basics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Cream             From the Manufacturer          Amazon Basics VERSATILE USE: Office desk chair for home office, work station, or conference room ADJUSTABLE COMFORT: Adjustable seat height, adjustable seat angle, and tilt control for customizable comfort STURDY CONSTRUCTION:Supports up to 275 pounds; sturdy KD metal base COMFORTABLE DESIGN:Puresoft PU upholstery in Black; contoured padded seat, backrest, and armrests for comfort; durable caster wheels for smooth-rolling mobility EASY ASSEMBLY:Assembly instructions included; components (casters, base, arms, seat mechanism, hardware kit) arrive packed in the back cushion PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: Product Dimensions: 23.75 x 26 x 38.25 - 42 inches (WxDxH); seat width: 19.5 inches; seat depth: 17.75 inches; arm height: 26.25 - 30 inches Brand - Amazon Basics ** Color - Cream ** Product Dimensions - 26"D x 23.75"W x 42"H ** Size - 26"D x 23.75"W x 42"H ** Back Style - Mid Back **

banner_details:
The banner features a modern and clean promotional design showcasing an office chair. The layout is divided into color-blocked quadrants, with a diagonal grid pattern and soft circular overlays. The left side includes three key text layers: the brand ("heading", "subheading"), product category ("tagline"), and a feature list ("description"). The text is arranged in a visually balanced hierarchy. The lower-left portion contains a bold price display ("price") and a rectangular dark button ("cta_button") with a call-to-action text ("cta"). The right side highlights the "product_image", prominently showcasing the chair. Small decorative circles add visual interest.

**Color Palette**:
- Light Beige: #F5F5F5
- Sandstone: #EAE6E0
- Taupe: #D6D1CA
- Mocha: #9A8E80
- Ivory: #FFFFFF
- Charcoal: #3B3B3B
- Warm Gray: #665A4D
product_color: The product image highlights a sleek, modern office chair featuring a minimalist color palette of creamy beige and deep black. The main seat and backrest are upholstered in a soft, neutral off-white or ivory tone (#F4F1ED), exuding elegance and comfort. Accents such as the armrests, base, and adjustment lever are in matte black (#1B1B1B), offering a bold contrast that adds definition and depth. The colors are used to clearly delineate functional components while harmoniously blending the soft seat with industrial-strength legs. For banner design, complement this palette with warm grey (#D9D6D2) and metallic charcoal (#3B3B3B) to enhance modernity and professionalism.
